// src/pages/Login.js import { useState } from 'react'; import React from 'react'; const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const handleChange = (event) => { const email = event.target.email; const value = event.target.value; setEmail(values => ({...values, [email]: value})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const myHeaders = new Headers(); myHeaders.append("Content-Type", "application/json"); const raw = JSON.stringify({ "username": input.email, "password": input.password, "expiresIn": 60000 }); const requestOptions = { method: "POST", headers: myHeaders, body: raw, redirect: "follow" }; fetch("https://www.melivecode.com/api/login", requestOptions) .then((response) => response.text()) .then((result) => console.log(result)) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); console.log(email); } return (

); }; export default Login;
